explains: v. 搭建，建造；使竖立，竖起；创立，建立；安装，装配；（使）勃起
adj. 竖直的，直立的；竖起的；勃起的，坚挺的

sentences.en: They plan to erect an apartment house on that property.
sentences.cn: 他们计划在那片地产上建造一座公寓楼。

sentences.en: Police had to erect barriers to keep crowds back.
sentences.cn: 警察只得设立路障来阻截人群。

sentences.en: Stand reasonably erect, your arms hanging naturally.
sentences.cn: 尽可能站直，双臂自然下垂。
